ygData.subject: RE: Bertoxx tinkering prices
ygData.msgSnippet: In the words of P. T. Barnum - There s a sucker born every minute. That said, I personally have ethical issues in selling something with such obviously limited
ygData.messageBody:
In the words of P. T. Barnum - There's a sucker born every minute.

That said, I personally have ethical issues in selling something with such
obviously limited use for 75 plat. Usually though, the price is set to what
the market will bear.

-----Original Message-----
From: DathaScome@...

Has anyone actually made aprofit off of any of this yet.I am guessing that
it
will be quite hard just becaus ewho the hell is going to be willing to pay75

pp for a spyglass or for that fact for anything we have there isnt much
demand for.Oh well just my 2 and a half cents.

Xalumkin of Bertoxx
